categories.name: The Great Wall & Beyond: Wonders of China

questions.clue: This ancient fortification spans over 13,000 miles and is a symbol of Chinese strength.
questions.answer: What is the Great Wall of China?

questions.clue: This team sport, featuring a small ball hit over a net with paddles, is China's national game and a subject of national pride.

Rising about 7,859 feet above sea level, this impressive peak is part of China’s famous Yellow Mountains.

categories.name: Legends of the Field: Iconic Sports Moments

questions.clue: In 2008, this Olympian from Jamaica broke the 100m world record in Beijing.
This Chinese basketball player was the first overall pick in the 2002 NBA Draft.
In 1986, this Argentine soccer player scored the 'Hand of God' goal against England.
At the 2004 Athens Paralympics, this South African athlete won the gold medals in the 100m, 200m, and 400m events.
This Chinese table tennis player, considered one of the greatest of all time, won 3 gold medals at both the 2008 and 2012 Olympics.

For $200: 'Call me Ishmael.' This line kicks off a tale about the obsessive quest of a whaling ship's captain to catch a giant white whale.
For $400: 'It was a bright cold day in April, and the clocks were striking thirteen.' This dystopian novel by George Orwell is set in a totalitarian regime.

For $600: 'It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.' This opening line sets the stage for societal observations in this author’s most famous work.
For $800: 'In a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit.' This line introduces readers to the adventures of Bilbo Baggins in Middle-earth.
For $1000: ‘It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.’ This famous line from a Charles Dickens novel juxtaposes two cities during the turbulent times of the French Revolution.
questions.answer: What is 'A Tale of Two Cities'?

questions.clue: This star, known as the North Star, is crucial for navigation and is part of the constellation Ursa Minor.
Famous in Chinese culture, this large constellation represents an archer and is known for housing the center of the Milky Way.
In Unreal Engine terms, if navigating the virtual sky by stars, you might spot this brightest star in the night sky from the constellation Canis Major.
This 'ancient' constellation, associated with one of the 12 animals of the Chinese zodiac, represents a mythical sea creature.
Considered challenging to locate, this constellation is known for the star Errai, significant in the celestial pole precession.

final.clue: In 2008, during these Summer Olympics held in China, this country's team initially took the bronze medal in team dressage but was later awarded silver after a successful appeal.
